ceterms:description:
IU Northwest offers the prestige of a degree from Indiana University, right here in the Region.

Step on our vibrant campus and you’ll find more than 70 degree programs, flexible learning options, top-notch faculty and a diverse community to call your own. Home to one of Northwest Indiana’s top business schools and only medical school, IU Northwest promises you a lifetime of success, no matter what you want to do.

We help you achieve the dream by making a high-quality education affordable and meaningful. We offer more than 40 student clubs and organizations to choose from and seven winning RedHawk athletic teams to root for. We’ve also established a growing network of more than 29,000 alumni across the region and around the world.
ceterms:name: Indiana University Northwest
